name: Ras
description: Heir of the Covenant, a defender of the world
story: Created to protect the world and all life within it, he is admired as the leader of the Heirs and the alter ego of the Goddess. He has a good personality and is very understanding, though he lacks some understanding of Humans.
get_line: I'll do my duty today, too!

relations.description: An Heir of the Sixth World, Kise fought alongside Ras against the Archdemon. Her intelligence and cool head gave Ras great confidence.
An Heir loved by all, Ruele was a gentle and trusted friend of Ras in the Sixth World.
Even though he was Heir of the Covenant, Vildred approached Ras cheerfully and without hesitation. Thanks to him, Ras has learned a lot.

relationships.name: 7th World Ritania
relationships.description: People met in Ritania after waking in the 7th World

relations.description: At first, it was hard for Ras to face Iseria, but as he came to learn of her sadness and her true heart, she became a trusted friend.
Krau is a shamelessly self-indulgent knight, but his incredible ability and open-minded personality gave Ras much strength.
Aither is Ras's biggest fan and supporter, and is happy to help him in any way he can.
Yuna is the extravagant and lively President of the Reingar Student Council, who joined forces with Ras in order to defeat Tenebria.
Kise was worried about Ludwig until the very end. He has great faith in Ras for saving Kromcruz, and sometimes shows a cute side.
Ras is unable to understand what would have led Vildred to betray him and the world.
A Suin who helps Ras out whenever he needs it. He seems to be a kind and righteous person.
Ras hopes that Spirit Lord Destina's grief is somehow able to reach Ruele.
A girl whose resolve is strong and unwavering, even after losing her hometown.
Ras has a hard time understanding the way he talks and acts, but he seems to be a reliable teammate.
A new threat to Orbis has arisen, and he lies behind all of the disasters and destruction.

specialty.name: Blessings of Covenant
specialty.description: The Heir of the Covenant bears the weight of the world upon his shoulders.

zodiac_tree.name: Potential Stone
zodiac_tree.description: Boosts the Hero's abilities by unleashing their potential.

costs.name: Reingar Student ID
costs.description: The personal information on this student ID was erased before it was discarded. It emits the endless desire for knowledge.

skills.name: X-Slash
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

quests.mission_description: The best way to improve is to keep on fighting.
Living as a human is not easy. I'll need a few things.

quests.mission_name: Acquire 200 Greater Runes in Spirit Altar
quests.mission_description: I need to get ready for new adventures while I train.
You now must face the ultimate opponent. Overcome your desire to cling to the past.

common.name: Dual Attack
common.effect: Chance to attack an enemy with basic skill after an ally has attacked them with basic skill, unless unable to act. Cannot be triggered by counterattacks.

skill1.name: 斬撃
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 指揮の一撃
skill2.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、攻撃力が最も高い味方に連携攻撃を付与する。
skill2.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、攻撃力が最も高い味方に連携攻撃を付与する。

skill3.name: 継承者の剣
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、ダメージに応じて自身の生命力を回復し、防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
